reviews.text: Platform 3 waiting room seating filthy and unusable . Clearly mopped down with floor mop and left to dry. Disgusting.

The station itself was ok but the female toilets were a disgrace. The disabled was filthy with paper strewn all over. One had no toilet paper & the other needed flushing as it was left in a disgusting state. The strong smell of urine was overpowering. It obviously isn't cleaned regularly and I saw no chart which states times of cleaning.

The station offers good interchange between the West Coast Mainline and the Cross Country route above. All of the platforms are connected by lifts and have some form of seating and shelter. A car park, toilets and ticket office is located on platform one. It's a shame trains to London aren't more frequent stopped here.
This station has a cool layout. Good for spotting trains at.
